radiographic_examinations.findings: Mild bibasilar atelectasis and subpleural bullae, centrilobular emphysema at lung bases, no focal hepatic lesions, normal gallbladder, no intra- or extra-hepatic biliary duct dilatation, spleen borderline enlarged measuring 12.5 cm, hypoattenuating lesion at upper pole of right kidney measuring 8 mm likely a simple cyst, additional smaller hypoattenuating lesions at left kidney likely simple cysts, no retroperitoneal or mesenteric lymphadenopathy, normal portal venous, systemic venous and systemic arterial system, no free air or free fluid in abdomen and pelvis, normal esophagus and small bowel, hypoattenuating, rim-enhancing lesion in descending colon in left lower quadrant measuring 3.5 x 2.5 x 2.5 cm with adjacent pericolonic fat stranding and fascial thickening likely consistent with focal diverticulitis with abscess formation, normal urinary bladder and uterus, no pelvic lymphadenopathy, dermoid at left ovary, no evidence of adnexal pathology, no suspicious lytic or sclerotic bony lesions.
